Home » 40P14 Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 5 Hetuhetusampayuttaduka
5.1--7 Paṭiccādivāra
Hetuhetusampayuttaduka
Paṭiccādivāra
7.
23Hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ceva nahetuvippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetuvippayutto ceva nanahetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ceva nahetuvippayutto ca nahetuvippayutto ceva nanahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)
24Hetusampayuttañceva na ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetuvippayutto ceva nanahetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetusampayuttañceva na ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ceva nahetuvippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetusampayuttañceva na ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ceva nahetuvippayutto ca nahetuvippayutto ceva nanahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)
25Hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca hetusampayuttañceva na ca hetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ceva nahetuvippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca hetusampayuttañceva na ca hetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetuvippayutto ceva nanahetu dhammo ca uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca hetusampayuttañceva na ca hetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ceva nahetuvippayutto ca nahetuvippayutto ceva nanahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
26Hetuyā nava…pe…  avigate nava. (Sahajātavārampi…pe…  pañhāvārampi vitthāretabbaṃ.)
